item.title: Ali Azizi - CV
item.description: Email aliazizi.79a@gmail.com - Telegram @KotlinByte phone : +98 910 969 1347 Education 98 - 400 BSc, Software engineering; University of Tehran markaz (Tehran) Experience Recent Work Experience: At the first stage of my software development journey, I started with java language, and after getting fluent in it, I dived into the Android framework, and after a short time, I chose Kotlin for android development. In this journey, I worked on different applications such as shops, warehouse management app, etc, and learned new stuff like what a design pattern is, concurrency, clean code, software architecture, etc.
